price: Ndetse na ba bandi batanga mu byo bahawe (mu bikorwa byiza nk’amaturo, ineza, iswala, igisibo n’ibindi) imitima yabo ifite ubwoba (ko ibyo bakoze bitakirwa, ndetse banatinya igihe) bazasubira kwa Nyagasani wabo.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَواْ وَّقُلُوبُهُمۡ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yu'tūna mā ātaw waqulūbuhum wajilatun annahum ilā rabbihim rājiʿūna
